go_data.justification: Trop-2 is targeted by antibody drug conjugates, implying it is accessible on the cell surface.
Trop-2 is targeted by specific antibodies, suggesting it may act as a receptor or have receptor-like activity.
Trop-2 induces ADAM10-mediated cleavage of e-cadherin and drives EMT-less metastasis in colon cancer.
